author: pokkagreentea100
comment: you definitely configured something wrong. go to your IIS manager and sites. for 10.0.2.15, do not create a new site, rather use the default site that they already have and bind 443 & 10.0.2.15 remember the Https
analysis:
```json
{
  "sentiment": "neutral",
  "topics": [],
  "complaints": [],
  "suggestions": ["go to your IIS manager and sites. for 10.0.2.15, do not create a new site, rather use the default site that they already have and bind 443 & 10.0.2.15 remember the Https"]
}
```
